content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'PatientAdmission' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'DSS')
CREATE TABLE DSS.PatientAdmissions
	(
	 [patient_id] bigint,
	 [first_name] nvarchar(4000),
	 [last_name] nvarchar(4000),
	 [email] nvarchar(4000),
	 [gender] nvarchar(4000),
	 [latest_prescription] nvarchar(4000),
	 [prescription_manufacturer] nvarchar(4000),
	 [admission_date] nvarchar(4000),
	 [admission_diagnosis] nvarchar(4000),
	 [recommended_procedure] bigint
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_PatientAdmission
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO DSS.PatientAdmission
(patient_id 1, first_name 2, last_name 3, email 4, gender 5, latest_prescription 6, prescription_manufacturer 7, admission_date 8, admission_diagnosis 9, recommended_procedure 10)
FROM 'https://demohc7on2ywpzovapoc.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Patient_Admission.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 11
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://demohc7on2ywpzovapoc.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM DSS.PatientAdmission
GO
